casebody.data:
Felix L. SORKIN, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. AMSYSCO, INC., Defendant-Appellee. No. 2006-1519. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. May 11, 2007.

*1000Before MAYER, Circuit Judge, CLEVENGER, Senior Circuit Judge and BRYSON, Circuit Judge.

Judgment

PER CURIAM:

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is

ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
